desc: Top athletes use lateral trainers to stay in peak form. With The Scoop, this patented technology is now available for you, too. Torch fat and tone your entire lower body 360 degrees at home with The Scoop.

layout.text:
A Revolution In
Therapeutic Home Fitness And Pain Therapy
Similar products retail for $299 or more!

Scoop® isn't just low impact - it is actually GOOD for your joints by strengthening the muscles that support healthy knees and hips.

Lateral training has been clinically proven to improve balance and lower your fall risk. Order today and see for yourself why Scoop® is the world's #1 at-home fitness solution!
